page.title: 16Village Hall, Functions
page.content:
The Village Hall in Diddlebury is put to many varied uses. It is hired weekly by the 1st Corvedale{Brownies, {Guides and Cubs.} The{British Legion meets in the hall monthly. The Corvedale Playgroup have been using the Village Hall 3 times a week while repairs are being carried out in the school house.
People may hire the hall for occasional uses like{dances or wedding {receptions. }It is used sometimes for {elections}and{bingo}sessions. The hall may be hired at a cost of Â£20 for those who live in the village and Â£22 for outsiders.
Sometimes there is{entertainment}by the Pentabus Travelling Company or Craven Arms Theatrical Society.
